byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and AL BAKER

abstract: Bronx man Allen McQueen is fatally shot in back while holding his infant daughter near his home; gunman has not been identified and remains at large as police attempt to determine if incident is gang-related.
lead_paragraph: The police said the 21-year-old victim, Allen McQueen, was a member of the Taylor Avenue Crew and had a long arrest record.

headline.main: Bronx Man Is Fatally Shot While Holding His 1-Year-Old Daughter
headline.print_headline: Bronx Man Killed as He Holds Child

snippet: The police said the 21-year-old victim, Allen McQueen, was a member of the Taylor Avenue Crew and had a long arrest record.
